text: The Serf Actress () is a 1963 Soviet movie directed by Roman Tikhomirov.История киностудии "Ленфильм". СправкаКРЕПОСТНАЯ АКТРИСА (1963) It stars Tamara Syomina, Yevgeny Leonov, and Dmitri Smirnov. == Actors == * Tamara Syomina as Anastasiya Batmanova * Yevgeny Leonov as Count Ivan Pavlovich Kutaysov * Dmitri Smirnov as Prince Andrei Tumansky * Sergey Yurskiy as Prince Nikita Petrovich Baturin * Grenada Mnatsakanova as Polenka * Aleksandr Potapov as Mitka == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1963 movies
title: The Serf Actress
